reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan lightweight and perfect for summer wear, with a nice fit and even hemming.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cardigan! Tips on wrinkles. . .
items.body: I ordered this cardigan in Faded Rose color to go with a specific outfit. Knowing that digital color is often different from the real color, I wasn't surprised when it wasn't an exact match, but luckily still went with the outfit. I ordered size small based on the size chart and it fits perfectly. It came in a flat, compression package and was completely wrinkled. I put it in the dryer on "Steam Fresh" for 15 minutes and at least 80% of the wrinkles came out. Then I tried the iron, as the label says "low iron". Unfortunately, low iron didn't touch the wrinkles, so I tried the lowest steam setting and that worked perfectly. Every wrinkle came out. This cardigan is so soft and feminine. It drapes perfectly to accent the outfit. I love the fit and style. It's very lightweight, but perfect for keeping me comfortable in air conditioning or cool evenings. Read more
items.author: Jacobc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Nice and lightweight to wear inside and out. Read more
items.author: Cm

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Basic Wardrobe Addition
items.body: I purchased this lightweight cardigan for air travel. It is viscose and spandex, stretchy and soft, fairly comfortable. For reference, I am 5’2”, 130 lbs. The medium fits well, and just covers the butt. I wish it was a bit longer since it grabs the pants and tend to ride up a bit. The sleeves are about 4 inches too long but can be pushed up and they stay in place. They are snug in my upper arms, but not uncomfortable since the fabric is stretchy. The front is slightly longer so that it can be tied, but doing so makes a lot of bulk around the waist and hips. I purchased the white, and it has a bit of a PJ appearance. I machine washed it and put on dryer at medium heat for 15 minutes, then hung it to finish drying. It worked well. All things considered it is ok, but I probably wouldn’t purchase again. Read more
items.author: Lyddie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely knit jacket
items.body: Nice casual knit jacket. I bought in black, navy, and red. Versatile and comfortable. I get lots of compliments when i wear them. True to size. Nice drape and you can cinch them with a belt too. Read more
items.author: Laura

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: Cardigan is comfortable and a good fit Read more
items.author: Benita Williams Stewart

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the color I expected
items.body: PROS: Soft, lightweight, true to size. CONS: Wrinkly, looks a bit sloppy, not the color I expected, more expensive than similar Amazon Essentials item I was looking for a neutral taupe or beige lightweight cardigan and found this along with a similar one from Amazon Essentials, and ordered them both. A lot of reviews are satisfied with this Newchoice one but I wasn't. Even before I took it out of the plastic to try it on, I could see I wasn't going to be happy with the color, which is kind of yellowish and not as neutral as the picture of the New Beige. The fit was fine. I'm 5'6", 126 lbs. and ordered Small. No problem with fit. It was a couple inches shorter than the other brand and shorter than my other lightweight cardigans but definitely not too short. The material was thin and lightweight, not cheap, but very wrinkly and even thought the wrinkles probably would come out after it was hanging for a while or steamed, I was concerned at how easily it might wrinkle while being worn. That and the yellowish color caused me to return it. I felt the Amazon Essentials version was superior in a few ways - it had pockets, which this one doesn't, it was a bit longer, the cut was a little more polished or refined (straighter, not so drapey), and just looked more put together and had a more flattering silhouette. Even though the fabric content was the same (Newchoice 95% viscose, 5% spandex/elastane, Amazon Essentials 95% viscose, 5% elastane), the fabric of the Newchoice cardigan did not feel as high quality or as durable. I still would have kept it for more casual wear if the color had been right and it wasn't so wrinkly. I can see why a lot of people like the Newchchoice one, but it just didn't work for me and I felt the other brand, which was $8 cheaper at the time of my purchase, was a better value overall. Read more
items.author: Kilidonia de Acero

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice cardigan
items.body: Nice and lightweight and paired well with a button down shirt without becoming bulky. Flows nicely and length was great as well. Read more
items.author: LeAnn N. Power

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs large
items.body: Runs large. Nice light cardigan. Good color Read more
items.author: Kristine

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, New-beige, Dark Grey, Light Apricot, New-baby Blue, Black, Camel, Royal Blue, Faded Rose, Light Pink, Coral Pink, Blue, Burnt Orange, Sage Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
